name: Maritime Lobster Casserole
author: MAMAFOO
summary: This is a very easy recipe with a lot of flavour and color.
ingredients: ½ large green bell pepper, diced
½ large red bell pepper, diced
2 pounds cooked and coarsely chopped lobster meat
¼ teaspoon salt, or to taste
¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
1 tablespoon butter, cut into small pieces, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Melt 1 teaspoon butter in a large frying pan over medium heat
Add onion, celery, green pepper, and red pepper; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes
Melt 1/4 cup butter in a large pot over medium-low heat; whisk in flour and cook for 1 minute
Add milk; cook until sauce is thickened, about 5 minutes
Stir vegetables and lobster into sauce; season with salt and pepper
Turn mixture into an 8x8-inch baking dish; sprinkle with bread crumbs, dot with butter pieces, and sprinkle with paprika
Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 30 minutes
